org.matrix.androidsdk.util

Class ContentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.util.ContentManager

  • public class ContentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for accessing content from the current session.

      • getDownloadableThumbnailUrl

        public java.lang.String getDownloadableThumbnailUrl(java.lang.String contentUrl,
                                                    int width,
                                                    int height,
                                                    java.lang.String method)
        Get an actual URL for accessing the thumbnail image of the given content URI.
        Parameters:
        contentUrl - the mxc:// content URI
        width - the desired width
        height - the desired height
        method - the desired scale method (METHOD_CROP or METHOD_SCALE)
        Returns:
        the URL to access the described resource
